post.description:
Create time slots with simple format (same times for all dates)

Example:
{
  "event_id": 1,
  "dates": ["2024-12-10", "2024-12-11"],
  "times": ["09:00", "14:00", "16:00"],
  "duration_minutes": 120
}

This will create:
- Dec 10: 09:00-11:00, 14:00-16:00, 16:00-18:00
- Dec 11: 09:00-11:00, 14:00-16:00, 16:00-18:00

get.description: Get all data needed for booking flow in one call

post.description:
Send booking confirmation email
Expected booking_data:
{
    "recipient_email": "user@example.com",
    "recipient_name": "John Doe",
    "event_title": "AI Workshop",
    "start_time": "2024-12-10 10:00 AM",
    "duration": 60,
    "booking_id": 123
}

Send AI-powered slot recommendations Expected data: { "recipient_email": "user@example.com", "recipient_name": "John Doe", "recommendations": "
  • Slot 1: Mon 10 AM (High demand)
", "confidence": 85 }
